statements: SELECT * FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT meeting_date, agenda FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_time >= '09:00:00';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_time < '12:00:00' AND agenda LIKE '%review%';
SELECT agenda FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_date = '2023-01-15' ORDER BY meeting_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_date FROM meetings_schedule ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT meeting_id, agenda FROM meetings_schedule ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings_schedule WHERE agenda LIKE '%important%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_meetings FROM meetings_schedule;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';
SELECT meeting_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS num_participants FROM participants GROUP BY meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM meetings JOIN participants ON meetings.meeting_id = participants.meeting_id WHERE meetings.meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE participant_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT meeting_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM participants GROUP BY meeting_id HAVING total_participants > 5;
SELECT meeting_id, participant_name, participant_email FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name ASC, meeting_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_time FROM meetings WHERE meeting_duration > 60;
SELECT p.participant_name, m.meeting_title FROM participants p JOIN meetings m ON p.meeting_id = m.meeting_id;
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_date FROM meetings;
SELECT * FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, meeting_time ASC, meeting_duration
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM meetings WHERE meeting_duration > 60
SELECT agenda_description, meeting_date, participant_name FROM agendas JOIN meetings ON agendas.meeting_id = meetings.meeting_id JOIN participants ON participants.meeting_id = meetings.meeting_id
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE meeting_id = 3
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT title, date, location FROM meetings;
SELECT attendee_id, name, email FROM attendees;
SELECT * FROM agenda_items WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT meeting_id, attendee_id, note_text FROM notes WHERE attendee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, title, date, start_time, end_time, location FROM meetings WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT meetings.title, attendees.name, notes.note_text FROM meetings, attendees, notes WHERE meetings.meeting_id = notes.meeting_id AND attendees.attendee_id = notes.attendee_id;
SELECT agenda_items.item_title, agenda_items.description, meetings.title FROM agenda_items JOIN meetings ON agenda_items.meeting_id = meetings.meeting_id;
SELECT DISTINCT meetings.title, attendees.name FROM meetings JOIN attendees ON meetings.meeting_id = attendees.attendee_id ORDER BY meetings.title ASC, attendees.name DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_date, start_time, end_time FROM meetings;
SELECT organizer, location FROM meetings WHERE meeting_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE attendee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT meeting_id, topic, speaker_name FROM agendas ORDER BY topic ASC;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_date, start_time, end_time, location, organizer FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT organizer, COUNT(*) AS total_meetings FROM meetings GROUP BY organizer;
SELECT a.attendee_name, m.meeting_date, a.email FROM attendees a JOIN meetings m ON a.meeting_id = m.meeting_id;

SELECT n.content, a.attendee_name, m.meeting_date FROM notes n JOIN attendees a ON n.attendee_id = a.attendee_id JOIN meetings m ON n.meeting_id = m.meeting_id ORDER BY m.meeting_date DESC, n.note_id ASC;
